title: QR code scanning not working on Pixel 4a all software up-to-date
content:
Hi,

I tried to scan a QR code in many ways and it's never working. I'm reading QR code from my laptop and twitched the luminosity without result. 
I have a Pixel 4a, Android 11 and all last software updates possible.
I try to scan a QR code from Google Lens: nothing !  If I choose the search option it recognise the image it's a QR code and shows me other QR code ! Also Lens recognise text above and below the QR code and highlight it.
I also dl a QR code scanner app and nothing too. 
I tried to scan the QR code from Whatsapp web, or other web site and nothing. 
I don't know it it's worked before with my Pixel 4a, but it has with my Pixel 3a. Don't remember if it was from a QR code scanner app, from camera or Lens, but I could like whatsapp or messages or use the QR code ro open a web page. It was fine; 

Any clue or tips to fix that ?

Thanks for your help
